Name: SourceQuestion
Description: Reference to a question used in the instruction.

Name: SourceVariable
Description: Reference to a variable used in the coding process

Name: ExternalInformation
Description: Reference to an external source of information used in the coding process, for example a value from a chart, etc.

Name: Description
Description: A description of the generation instruction. May be expressed in multiple languages and supports the use of structured content.

Name: CommandCode
Description: Structured information used by a system to process the instruction.

Name: ControlConstructReference
Description: A control construct which is used to describe or process the instruction.

Name: Aggregation
Description: Describes the aggregation process, identifying both the independent and dependent variables within the process.

Name: IsDerived
Description: Default setting is "true", the instruction describes a derivation. If the instruction is a simple recode, set to "false".
